caption.p: Rapid Visco-Analyzer pasting curves for OFSP and OFSP-based composite flours. Samples A, B, C and D are orange fleshed sweet potato-based composite flours with skimmed milk powder at substitution levels 20%, 25%, 30% and 35% respectively while amaranth leaves powders were 2%, 2.5%, 5% and 10% respectively.
